snippet: The low temperature dipped to 3 degrees in Central Park on Monday morning, missing the record set for that date, but the wind chills in the city were below minus 10.
abstract: New York City reaches near-record low temperature of 0 degrees with wind chill of minus-20, to shock of some city residents.

byline.contributor: Nikita Stewart and John Surico contributed reporting.

lead_paragraph: The low temperature dipped to 3 degrees in Central Park on Monday morning, missing the record set for that date, but the wind chills in the city were below minus 10.

headline.main: Record-Low Temperatures or Not, New Yorkers Are Feeling the Chill
headline.print_headline: Temperatures So Frigid That Even an Ice Bar Turned Into a Refuge
